title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7817.4 - Accident reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7817.4 - Accident reports

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a cogeneration, small hydro or
alternate energy production facility shall file with the State Energy Office a
description of any accident connected with or growing out of the operation of
such facility and resulting in the injury to any person who is not employed by
the owner or operator of such facility or to the property of any such person. Reports shall be filed with the State Energy Office within three business days
of any such accident. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7817.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
